name: babel-plugin-annotate-pure-calls
description: Babel plugin for annotating automatically pure function calls.
author: Mateusz Burzy≈Ñski <mateuszburzynski@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Andarist)

scripts.pretest: if [ ! -d ./node_modules/$npm_package_name ]; then npm run self-link; else npm run build; fi
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
